PerfectNetExp.abs: ...得越来越不重要。当司铎在高高的祭坛上进行弥撒仪式时，按照罗马教会的教导，有两件神迹发生了。第一件是“变质”（transubstantiation），即饼和酒已经不再是饼和酒了，他们的实质（substance）已经变成了基督的身体和血，尽管外表（a.
transtensional basin 扭张盆地transubstantiation 使变质transudate 渗出液
transubject 跨学科教学, transubstantiation 变体, transubstantiate 使变质

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin transsubstantio (see trans-, substance)

means.word_mean: 1. the Roman Catholic doctrine that the whole substance of the bread and the wine changes into the substance of the body and blood of Christ when consecrated in the Eucharist
2. an act that changes the form or character or substance of something

auth_sentence.content: The viewer bears witness to the process of transubstantiation.
auth_sentence.res_content: The viewer bears witness to the process of transubstantiation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The viewer bears witness to the process of transubstantiation.

auth_sentence.content: Either they believe in transubstantiation which patently and provably does not take place.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Either they believe in transubstantiation which patently and provably does not take place.

auth_sentence.content: This is called Transubstantiation and is celebrated in the festival of Corpus Christi.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is called Transubstantiation and is celebrated in the festival of Corpus Christi.
